column1: Villemomble is a commune in the eastern suburbs of Paris
column2: France. It is located 12.1 km (7.5 mi) from the center of Paris.

column1: Villemomble is served by Le Raincy – Villemomble – Montfermeil station on Paris RER line E.
There are seven public preschools/nurseries (maternelles): Foch
column7: Saint-Exupéry. There are five public elementary schools: Foch I
column11: and Saint-Exupéry.There are two public junior high schools
column12: Collège Jean de Beaumont and Collège Pasteur
column13: and two public senior high schools/sixth-form colleges
column14: Lycée Georges Clemenceau and Lycée professionnel Blaise Pascal.Private schools include École maternelle Saint-Alexis
column16: And the junior and senior high school of Institution Saint-Louis Blanche de Castille (collège Saint-Louis and lycée Blanche de Castille).
